snippet.title: Can you play cricket on Mars? : and other scientific questions answered
snippet.description: Can you play cricket on Mars? : and other scientific questions answered / Moore, Sir Patrick All those nagging questions you have about the universe are answered here, like 'Is there a dark side to the moon? What happens when a comet hits the sun? Do the Martian canals have any water in them? Is the moon hot inside? What would happen if the sun were to collide with a black hole? Mars has polar ice caps: could polar bears live on Mars? if I could go back to the time of the dinosaurs, would the sky look the same as it does today?' and many more [...] New York : The History Press, 2011. - 342 p.
